actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations requiring certain modes of public transportation in interstate commerce to reserve some seating capacity for passengers who do not smoke.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations requiring carriers by rail, motor vehicle, and air in interstate commerce to reserve some seating capacity for passengers who do not smoke.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations requiring certain modes of public transportation in interstate commerce to reserve some seating capacity for passengers who do not smoke.
